messages.subject: Verizon ( sort of OT sort of not)
messages.msgSnippet: I was reading at the Verizon site about how Schools (public and private, ect)can get discounted priced services but homeschoolers cannot. I wrote them and told
messages.messageBody:
I was reading at the Verizon site about how Schools (public and private,
ect)can get discounted priced services but homeschoolers cannot. I wrote them
and told them how unfair that was, that I personally would change some or all
of my services if I could receive the educator/school discount and suggested
they give homeschoolers the same percentage as the public/private schools in
their zip code. I will keep all informed of their responses. Lynn F


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
